// INSTRUCTIONS: Copy this to settings.json and customize for your project
// NOTE: settings.local.json is gitignored for machine-specific permissions (auto-populated during sessions)

allow: // Common safe commands - uncomment as needed
// LLM Council (optional) - consult multiple AI models

// HOOKS DOCUMENTATION.PreToolUse: Runs BEFORE a tool executes. Return non-zero to block.
// HOOKS DOCUMENTATION.PostToolUse: Runs AFTER a tool executes. Good for validation.
// HOOKS DOCUMENTATION.Notification: Runs when Claude wants to notify (e.g., task complete).

PreToolUse.// description: Format files before edits are accepted

hooks.command: if [[ $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH == *.ts ]] || [[ $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH == *.tsx ]]; then npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -20; fi
if [[ $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH == *.py ]]; then ruff check $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 2>&1 | head -10; fi

env.// description: Environment variables available to hooks and commands
